name: Angry God
description:
ANGRY GOD

The people of Cube City have angered you, their God. 

DESTROY THEM ALL!

Controls:

WASD - Move around

QE - Look around

Left Click - DESTROY

The aim is to destroy as many buildings, cars and people in the time limit, although make sure to get some chain reactions to boost your multiplier.

I made this for my first game jam, I hope you enjoy it :) Comment your high scores
